name: Pool Master - Trick Shot City
description:
Welcome to the Trick Shot City 8 Ball Pool Game

Pool Masters - Trick Shot city is an arcade style Trick Shots Pool Game with single player. If you love trick shots of 8 ball, this is the game for you!

In Pool Masters, gameplay is king! Billiards Town uses the latest technology for the most amazing and realistic billiards simulator. Our real Trick Shots Pool Game will give you experience like never before. Challenge kinds of Tricks Shots of different ability from beginner right up to pro level. Keep challenging and learn all the Trick Shots Skills in Billiards Town. You are the next Pool Master!

Play Pool Masters - Billiards Town and become Trick Shots Master. Clear all balls in one shot! Join us now and enjoy the fun playing pool trick shots!

KEY Features
- Addictive Single Player Mode
- Excellent simulation with accurate ball physics
- Realistic Tricks Shot animation
- Touch control for moving cue and shot balls

Grab your master cue and play now. One Shot Clear All!
Show off your Trick Shot Skills! Pool Masters!
